name: Ryan Gosling
summary: Ryan Gosling. Actor: Blue Valentine. Born Ryan Thomas Gosling on November 12, 1980, in London, Ontario, Canada, he is the son of Donna (Wilson), a secretary, and Thomas Ray Gosling, a traveling salesman. Ryan was the second of their two children, with an older sister, Mandi. His ancestry is French-Canadian, as well as English, Scottish, and Irish. The Gosling family moved to Cornwall, Ontario, where Ryan grew up and was...
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars | 37 wins & 160 nominations total
